snippet.title: Skeleseller trailer (upcoming indie game)
snippet.description:
This is an early trailer of Skeleseller, an upcoming "idle-lite" game where you manage a town as a skeleton. Hire adventurers, battle, and sell the items to build and upgrade your town!

This footage was captured during an early version of the game in January, 2025. It'll be available as a free demo during Steam's Idler Fest and also during Next Fest in February.

Please wishlist the game! It helps a lot, especially in the festivals: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3226210/Skeleseller

#indiegame
